org.hps.recon.filtering

Class MollerCandidateFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.filtering.EventReconFilter
        • org.hps.recon.filtering.MollerCandidateFilter

  • public class MollerCandidateFilter
extends EventReconFilter
    Class to strip off Moller candidates. Currently the tight selection is defined as: e- e- events with tracks matched to each cluster. Neither electron can be a full-energy candidate (momentum less than _fullEnergyCut [0.85GeV]) but the momentum sum must be consistent with the beam energy (greater than _mollerMomentumSumMin and less than _mollerMomentumSumMax). The Ecal cluster times must be within _timingCut [2.5ns] of each other. One can also set calorimeter-only cuts if one is interested in understanding tracking issues.

    • Nested Class Summary
